question:
In context with the testing of Prithvi-II missiles at night in November, consider the following statements:
  1. This is the first night time trial of Prithvi-II.
  2. It is capable of carrying nuclear warheads.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The November test was the second night time test of the Prithvi-II missile. Previously, it was tested in February 2018. The testing was done at Interim Test Range of Odisha. It was launched from a mobile launcher and monitored by the DRDO. Â Statement 2 is correct: The Prithvi-II is a nuclear capable missile. It is a surface to surface missile. This is the second night time testing of an indigenously developed missile in November, after the Agni-II testing. Prithvi-II has a strike range of 350km.
